articles.description: A bell ringer in the Las Vegas valley received a surprise recently. Someone anonymously dropped a Canadian Gold Maple Leaf coin into a red kettle this week, according to The Salvation Army. The coin, weighing at one ounce, is believed to be worth between $1,8…

articles.title: The Best and Worst New ETFs of 2020 - Morningstar.com
articles.description: There were a record number of new ETFs launched in 2020. These are our selections for the year's best and worst.
articles.content: As of Dec. 17, there were a record 276 new exchange-traded funds launched in 2020. This marks the fastest pace of new launch activity since the prior record was set in 2015. There are now 2,288 ETFs … [+7977 chars]
